name: PolyGod
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: PolyGod is a virtual game based on the blockchain allowing players to battle each other in an epic PVP conquest fight to triumph over the land riches.
